----- Original Message -----
From: M
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, April 10, 2000 6:34 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom]

Hello,
Is anyone aware of any mailing lists or discussion groups for homeschool graduates?
I am a former homeschooler (now adult), and would like to meet others.

Thanks!

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]
messages.msgSnippet: Hey!  I would love to hear from YOU!  How was your experience as an hs-er? Are you a well-balanced and happy person?  {Smile}  Can you support yourself and
messages.messageBody:
Hey! I would love to hear from YOU! How was your experience as an hs-er?
Are you a well-balanced and happy person? {Smile} Can you support yourself
and live a "normal" life? I'm basically asking because I have these fears
sometimes in the middle of the night that I might be doing a horrible
disservice to my daughter as I know she doesn't know all of the science,
history, math, etc. as other kids her age. In my waking moments, I know that
she is becoming the most incredible human being and has so many special gifts
to share with the world and I believe this world needs more people like her.
I would love it if you could share some of your thoughts. Thanks, Jackie

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]
messages.msgSnippet: Kimberly Hi!  I was just wondering where your group meets as I am unschooling my 11 yr old dd and I also live in NJ.   Thanks jackie
messages.messageBody:
Kimberly
Hi! I was just wondering where your group meets as I am unschooling my
11 yr old dd and I also live in NJ. Thanks jackie
